metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19815 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel 5.0.21, mounting a crafted f2fs filesystem image can cause a NULL pointer dereference in f2fs_recover_fsync_data in fs/f2fs/recovery.c. This is related to F2FS_P_SB in fs/f2fs/f2fs.h.
